quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to figure out why the atmosphere became chaotic.

quest.name: Effort to Expose the Evilization
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ and the Humanitas Research Institute are making an effort to investigate the principle of evilization. Evilization is a power of darkness that the Daemon Army used to make the mechanical soldiers of Tairen come under their command. $npcName:11004614$ said they can make progress in their research if you can get the parts of the mechanical soldiers that turned evil. Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022707$ and $npcName:25022708$, and retrieve $item:30001357$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022707$ and $npcName:25022708$, and retrieve $item:30001357$.

quest.name: Reveal the Identity of the One-horned Monster
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the attack on $map:02020070$ failed again due to $npcName:25022601$ of the Daemon Army. They watch the soldiers from the air and then attack at lightning speed. If the research team could study the principle of that speed, they can reduce the damage to the soldiers. For that, $npcName:11004614$ asks that you get $item:30001358$. Go to $map:02020070$, defeat $npcName:25022601$, and get $item:30001358$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$, defeat $npcName:25022601$, and get $item:30001358$.

quest.name: Overflowing Humanitas Military Hospital
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Humanitas military hospital is overflowing with patients. All of them are soldiers bitten by robot spiders in $map:02020071$. Your entire body becomes paralyzed once bitten by the robot spiders. $npcName:11004614$ said many more soldiers need to be dispatched to evacuate the paralyzed soldiers. The mounting damage must be stopped. Go to $map:02020071$ and defeat $npcName:25022705$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and defeat $npcName:25022705$.

quest.name: An Oppontent to Contend Against
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said that attack on $map:02020071$ failed again due to the one-horned monster of the Daemon Army. It habitually scatters the battle formation of our soldiers by circling in the air and using a tactic of dropping down at lightning speed. Listening to $npcName:11004614$ stimulated your competitive spirit. Go to $map:02020071$ and contend against $npcName:25022700$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and contend against $npcName:25022700$.

quest.name: Great Idea to Obtain Aetherine
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the production of aetherine in $map:02020030$ isn't going smoothly due to the prolonged war with Tairen. The parts of the aetherine reactor are old and aren't performing as they should. She said there's an aetherine generator in $map:02020034$ set up by Tairen. $npcName:11004614$ said the aetherine reactor in $map:02020030$ will function as it should if a part called STX-17 can be taken from the generator. Go to $map:02020034$ and get the aetherine generator part STX-17.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020034$ and get the aetherine generator part STX-17
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020034$ and get the aetherine generator part STX-17.

quest.name: Lunatic Highway
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the intelligence department found Tairen's $map:52100115$ in $map:02020013$. She thinks Tairen is planning on linking $map:02020013$ and $map:02020010$ with a highway. Once the construction is complete, $map:02020013$ the supply route will be attacked by Tairen forces from $map:02020010$ via the highway. You can't watch the collapse of the Humanitas supply route. Go to $map:52100115$ linked to $map:02020013$ and suppress $npcName:25023000$, $npcName:25023001$, and $npcName:25023002$ that are put into the construction.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100115$ linked with $map:02020013$ and suppress $npcName:25023000$, $npcName:25023001$, and $npcName:25023002$.

quest.name: Treasure Island of Kharon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the reconnaissance team discovered $map:52100116$ in $map:02020003$. Analyzing the video footage revealed it be a warehouse storing food produced by the refugees put to hard labor by Kharon. $npcName:11004614$ said if $map:52100116$ can be attacked and the security forces neutralized, the allied soldiers can seize the food. Go to $map:52100116$ in $map:02020003$, and suppress $npcName:25023100$ and $npcName:25023101$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100116$ in $map:02020003$, and suppress $npcName:25023100$ and $npcName:25023101$.

quest.name: Defend $map:02020014$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen placed an explosive in $map:02020014$. $map:02020014$ was built by Humanitas to preserve and study the flora and fauna of Kidel. She thinks Tairen wants to blow up all of $map:02020014$ seeing the scale of the explosive. You can't watch $map:02020014$ get destroyed. Go to $map:02020014$ and disarm the MK42 explosive placed by Tairen.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020014$ and disarm the MK42 explosive placed by Tairen
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020014$ and disarm the MK42 explosive placed by Tairen.

quest.name: Group of Evil and Hoodlums
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon started to release some of the supply boxes they got from Tairen to the Leshy hoodlums. The reason was to win over the Leshy hoodlums and mobilize them in kidnapping refugees. $npcName:11004614$ is concerned that the kidnapping of refugees will be accelerated if the Leshy hoodlums are won over. Go to $map:02020008$ and seize the supply box before it goes to the Leshy hoodlums.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020008$ and seize the supply box
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020008$ and seize the supply box before it goes to the Leshy hoodlums.

quest.name: Mysterious Power of the Ancient Temple
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $map:02020018$ is a temple of Kritias built during ancient times. No one knows who built the temple and for what purpose since it was a long, long time ago. $npcName:11004614$ said the research team are investigating relics emitting a blue light in $map:02020018$. She said they haven't found out the identity of the blue light or the function of the relic, but they won't give up and will continue researching. Go to $map:02020018$ and get the shiny blue relic for the research team.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020018$ and get the shiny blue relic
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020018$ and get the shiny blue relic for the Humanitas research team.

quest.name: Hiding Place of Corruption
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the intelligence team finally discovered the secret residence of the Leshy hoodlums after much effort. The place called $map:52100117$ exists in a secret place in $map:02020008$. She said the Leshy hoodlums made $map:52100117$ their base and are attacking strangers and expanding their forces. A huge blow can be dealt to the Leshy hoodlums if $map:52100117$ is attacked. Go to $map:52100117$ in $map:02020008$, and suppress $npcName:25023201$ and $npcName:25023202$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100117$ in $map:02020008$, and suppress $npcName:25023201$ and $npcName:25023202$.

quest.name: Defense System of Tairen
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Humanitas-Maple Alliance surprise attack on $map:02020037$ failed. The attack was discovered due to the intruder detection sensor set up in $map:02020037$. $npcName:11004614$ is discouraged saying that future surprise attacks won't be possible as long as the high performance intruder detection sensor is in $map:02020037$. Infiltrate $map:02020037$ stealthily and turn off Tairen's intruder detection sensor.
quest.manual: Turn of the intruder detection sensor in $map:02020037$
quest.descFameUI: Infiltrate $map:02020037$ and turn off Tairen's intruder detection sensor.

quest.name: Disaster Caused by Doing Well
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon's anger reached the extreme when the attack on $map:02020066$ failed. The angry Kharon forces are throwing grenades indiscriminately at $map:02020066$. If this continues, the damage to the refugees will be uncontrollable. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to defeat the Kharon forces. You need to receive the '$quest:40002813$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to defeat the Kharon forces.

quest.name: $npcName:11004614$'s Ulterior Motive
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ asked what kind of woman the men of Maple World like. When asked why she's curious, she was taken aback and said she just asked. Then $npcName:11004614$ suddenly asked you for $item:30001359$ on $npcName:25022202$'s tail. She said it's to figure out $npcName:25022202$'s structure by analyzing the ore, but something feels suspicious. For now, go to $map:02020066$, defeat $npcName:25022202$, and get $item:30001359$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$, defeat $npcName:25022202$, and get $item:30001359$.

quest.name: Developing Conspiracy
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Daemon Army forces stationed in $map:02020067$ have been strengthened. They haven't attacked the refugees yet, but there's a need to find out why their forces have been strengthened. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out why the Daemon Army strengthened its forces. You need to receive the '$quest:40002814$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find out why the Daemon Army strengthened its forces.

quest.name: Repeating Cruel History
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the squad witnessed Kharon kidnapping refugees. She felt sad that the squad wasn't able to rescue them since Kharon put them in the vehicle and left. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to rescue the refugees. You need to receive the '$quest:40002815$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to rescue the refugees.

quest.name: Terror of $map:02020068$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said there are rumors going around that $map:02020068$ is struck with fear. She said an unidentified lifeform is roaming the forest and attacking the Leshy. If nothing is done, Leshy victims will continue to increase. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to understand the situation and find a solution. You need to receive the '$quest:40002816$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to understand the situation and find a solution.

quest.name: Her Way of Persuasion
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ thinks their exchange with the Leshy became distant because they were busy taking care of the refugees. She believes they can commune with the Leshy if they meet and talk with $npc:11004620$. They talked with $npc:11004620$ not too long ago, but it wasn't at a level to satisfy $npcName:11004614$. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to talk and find out if any help is needed. You need to receive the '$quest:40002817$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to talk and find out if any help is needed.

quest.name: Mysterious Spore
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the ecosystem near $map:02020069$ is thrown into confusion. She said something like a spore scattered everywhere, and the animals of the forest are going wild because of it. $npcName:11004614$ asked that you go and investigate. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to investigate the matter. You need to receive the '$quest:40002818$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to investigate the matter.

quest.name: $map:02020069$ in Chaos
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said robot insects broke into $map:02020069$. $map:02020069$ has fallen into chaos as $npcNamePlural:25022505$ are attacking the Leshy indiscriminately. If nothing is done, $map:02020069$ will be in great danger. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a way to defeat $npcNamePlural:25022505$. You need to receive the '$quest:40002819$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a way to defeat $npcNamePlural:25022505$.

quest.name: Scattering Dark Power
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $npcName:25022602$ that was encroached by the dark power in $map:02020070$ is releasing pollen. She said the contaminated pollen of $npcName:25022602$ is corrupting northern Kidel with dark power. Before the contamination spreads, go to $map:02020070$ and defeat $npcName:25022602$ encroached by the dark power.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and defeat $npcName:25022602$ encroached by the dark power.

quest.name: Continuing Research
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Humanitas Research Institute is doing research on evilization. The mechanical soldiers that turned evil became black and went under the control of the Daemon Army. $npcName:11004614$ said the research will make progress if they can get the parts from $npcName:25022708$. Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022708$, and get $item:30001362$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022708$, and get $item:30001362$.

quest.name: Between Sincerity and Mischief
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ asked what kind of gift do men of Maple World like. You joked saying they like very hideous and fierce pets, then she asked you capture $npcName:25022706$. You couldn't take back what you said. Go to $map:02020071$ and capture $npcName:25022706$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and capture $npcName:25022706$.

quest.name: Opponent Making Your Blood Boil
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the special forces deployed to $map:02020071$ suffered greatly from $npcName:25022701$. They had no choice but to retreat because many were injured by its monstrous strength and sharp horns. To be able to defeat the most elite troops of Humanitas... it's stirring up your competitive spirit. Go to $map:02020071$ and suppress $npcName:25022701$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$ and suppress $npcName:25022701$.

quest.name: Underhanded Wiretap
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said one platoon of the Humanitas regular army was captured by Tairen forces. It's because Tairen wiretapped the contents of the operation from the communication between $map:02020030$ and $map:02020033$. $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen wiretapped from $map:02020016$ using the radio tower. As long as the wiretapping continues, the losses won't end. Go to $map:02020016$ and destroy the radio tower.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020016$ and destroy the radio tower.

quest.name: The Cost of Information
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the gold bar box to be delivered to Kharon is loaded in $map:02020010$. The gold bar box is being provided to Kharon in return for giving information to Tairen. $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon will arrive in $map:02020010$ soon to claim the gold bar box. Go to $map:02020010$ and intercept the gold bar box before Kharon claims it.
quest.manual: Intercept the gold bar box in $map:02020010$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020010$ and intercept the gold bar box before Kharon claims it.

quest.name: Guardsmen's Luxury Item
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ has an idea to make the Tairen Guardsmen be in a predicament. The guardsmen are formed of nobles and regularly use luxury item box even in the battleground to live an abundant life. She said the luxury item box transported by air from Tairen will arrive near $map:02020033$ soon. If the items in the luxury item box are seized, the Tairen Guardsmen will fall into panic. Intercept the items of the luxury item box near $map:02020033$.
quest.manual: Intercept the items of the luxury item box near $map:02020033$
quest.descFameUI: Intercept the items of the luxury item box near $map:02020033$.

quest.name: Twisted Ambition
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ obtained intel that the the robots abandoned in $map:02020051$ are making weapons. They are making weapons from waste with the purpose of selling them to Kharon. According to the intelligence department, there is going to be a weapon trade today between Kharon and the robots in $map:52100118$ at the Dumping Ground. You can't watch the accomplishment of the weapon trade strengthening Kharon's fighting power. Go to $map:52100118$ in $map:02020051$ and suppress $npcName:25023300$ and $npcName:25023301$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100118$ in $map:02020051$ and suppress $npcName:25023300$ and $npcName:25023301$.

quest.name: Loathsome Farming
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon is growing crops in $map:02020003$. They kidnap the refugees and put them to do hard labor in the farmland. According to our squad, a new seed arrived in $map:02020003$ not too long ago. If that seed is seized, Kharon will have problems with their food supply. Go to $map:02020003$ and seize the seed.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020003$ and seize the seed.

quest.name: Making Efforts for the Investigation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said they detected an equipment in $map:02020035$ suspected of being an evilization converter. She said this equipment is used to convert the mechanical soldiers of Tairen to be subordinates of the Daemon Army. If the key part of the converter is taken, it will be helpful in investigating the principle of evilization. Go to $map:02020035$ and get the key part of the converter.
quest.manual: Get the key part of the converter in $map:02020035$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020035$ and get the key part of the converter.

quest.name: Raving Evil
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon set up a high-frequency aetherine emanator in $map:02020009$. She said Kharon is trying to use it to make the abandoned robots in $map:02020009$ go out of control. $npcName:11004614$ said the allied squad carrying out an operation in $map:02020009$ some time ago suffered greatly from attacks by the robots that went out of control. The losses will continue unless the high-frequency aetherine emanator is turned off. Go to $map:02020009$ and turn off the high-frequency aetherine emanator.
quest.manual: Turn off the high-frequency aetherine emanator in $map:02020009$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020009$ and turn off the high-frequency aetherine emanator.

quest.name: Tairen's Lethal Weapon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Humanitas-Maple Alliance attack on $map:02020037$ failed. She said they failed because of the long-range artillery placed by Tairen. The exceptional destructive power, firing rate, and accuracy of the long-range artillery called KG-42 made the allied forces suffer greatly and retreat. For the attack on $map:02020037$ to succeed, the long-range artillery must be suppressed. Go to $map:02020037$ and destroy the long-range artillery.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020037$ and destroy the long-range artillery.

quest.name: $map:02020066$ in Disorder
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ obtained intel that Galan is in disorder. Refugees doing whatever they want instead of keeping order are increasing. $npcName:11004614$ wants you to find out whether the cause is external or $npc:11004574$ is losing leadership. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to restore order. You need to receive the '$quest:40002820$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to restore order.

quest.name: Another Threat
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the squad evacuated unconscious refugees near Galan to $map:02020030$. According to the medical officer, the refugees were injured by something else and not Kharon's weapon. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to track what attacked the refugees. You need to receive the '$quest:40002821$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to track what attacked the refugees.

quest.name: Expert $npcName:11004614$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ is concerned of the refugees suffering from the heat. She didn't make an explicit request, but was giving silent pressure. Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to resolve the heat. You need to receive the '$quest:40002822$' mission from $npc:11004574$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020066$ and meet $npc:11004574$ to find a way to resolve the heat.

quest.name: Firework of Thoughts
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen does fireworks around this time every year. It's to wish happiness for their loved ones. She's concerned the refugees of Galan might be grieved since they can't do fireworks. It would be possible for the refugees to do fireworks by using Kharon's Throwing Bomb. Go to $map:02020067$, suppress $npcName:25022303$, and get Throwing Bomb.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020067$, suppress $npcName:25022303$, and get $item:30001364$.

quest.name: Encroaching $map:02020068$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $map:02020068$ is being rapidly encroached due to the dark power. The Daemon Army hasn't been contaminating $map:02020068$ recently, but the speed has increased. If nothing is done, $map:02020069$ might get tainted by the dark power. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a way to stop the contamination. You need to receive the '$quest:40002825$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find a way to stop the contamination.

quest.name: Food Shortage in $map:02020069$
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Leshy in $map:02020069$ are going through a food shortage. The Leshy lived a rich life with the abundant tree fruits, but a food shortage... It's clear that something happened. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to investigate the cause of the food shortage. You need to receive the '$quest:40002826$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to investigate the cause of the food shortage.

quest.name: A Problem to Be Resolved
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Daemon Army isn't stopping their attempt on stealing the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy. They are continually sending lifeforms encroached by the dark power to $map:02020069$. $npcName:11004614$ is worried because the Leshy won't be able to fend them off with their primitive weapon. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to discuss a way to tighten security. You need to receive the '$quest:40002823$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to discuss a way to tighten security.

quest.name: Unusual Movement of the Leshy
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the residents in $map:02020069$ have been noticeably active. According to the drone video, it looks like the Leshy are gathering in a specific location and it doesn't look like commercial activity. It's fine if it's something good but... you need to help the Leshy if it's something bad. Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find out what happened. You need to receive the '$quest:40002824$' mission from $npc:11004620$ and complete it.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020069$ and meet $npc:11004620$ to find out what happened.

quest.name: For a Full-Scale Attack
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said a full-scale attack on $map:02020070$ started. She said the regular army and the special forces will attack $map:02020070$ together. There will be many casualties due to the firm defense of $map:02020070$. The casualties can be reduced if $npcName:25022600$, the main force, is suppressed before the full-scale attack. Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022600$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022600$.

quest.name: Spreading Evilization
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the offensive operation on $map:02020070$ has hit a snag. It's because the Daemon Army turned $npcName:25022604$ evil and deployed to $map:02020070$. She said $npcName:25022604$ is dealing great damage to the allies with its sharp poison stinger. Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022604$ before there are more casualties.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022604$.

quest.name: Find the Source of Power
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said a few of the Daemon Army forces deployed to $map:02020071$ have monstrous combat power. $npcName:25022702$ especially has powerful combat power that can't be explained with its physical structure. $npcName:11004614$ asked the research team for their opinion and it seems highly likely that $item:30001367$ on the head of $npcName:25022702$ is its source of power. Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022702$, and obtain $item:30001367$ for thorough research.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022702$, and obtain $item:30001367$.

quest.name: Spear and Shield
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the rifle bullet of the allies can't pierce the shield of $npcName:25022704$ stationed in $map:02020071$. She said they need to analyze the shield's component and find a way to pierce it in order to attack $map:02020071$. Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022704$, and obtain $item:30001368$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020071$, defeat $npcName:25022704$, and obtain $item:30001368$.

quest.name: Abandoned Cannon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the outskirts of $map:02020032$ have been occupied by the Daemon Army. She said the allied forces retreated in a hurry and neglected the mid-range cannon. $npcName:11004614$ is sad because retrieving at least the parts would be very helpful to the fighting power of the allies. Go to $map:02020032$ and retrieve the mid-range cannon parts to strengthen the military power of Humanitas.
quest.manual: Retrieve the mid-range cannon parts near $map:02020032$
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020032$ and retrieve the mid-range cannon parts.

quest.name: Reward of Temptation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said they discovered the location of the weapon box that Tairen gave Kharon. These weapon boxes were obtained by Kharon for providing information to Tairen. $npcName:11004614$ said Kharon claimed the weapon box and transported it to $map:02020016$. The weapon box can be discovered if they are ambushed there. Go to $map:02020016$ and seize the weapon box.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020016$ and seize the weapon box.

quest.name: $npcName:11004614$'s Curiosity
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the Poings in $map:02020013$ are obsessed with a certain fruit tree. It's a fruit tree with blue fruits. They attack fiercely when the scout team goes near it. $npcName:11004614$ can't stand the curiosity of why the Poings are obsessed with the fruit tree. Go to $map:02020013$ and pick the blue fruit for $npcName:11004614$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020013$ and pick the blue fruit.

quest.name: $map:02020033$ in Crisis
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen's long-range cannons are placed in the outskirts of $map:02020033$. The long-range cannon called KG-42 is a weapon with tremendous destructive power. She's worried that $map:02020033$ will receive great damage once the long-range cannons are fired. Go to $map:02020033$ before the firing begins and destroy the long-range cannons.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020033$ and destroy the long-range cannons.

quest.name: Collapsed Authority
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $npc:11004618$ made contact with the allies through his aide, $npcName:11004619$. $npc:11004619$ offered to arrange a meeting with $npcName:11004618$ if you come to $map:02020051$ to see him. Once you gain $npcName:11004618$, you will have important information to destroy Kharon. Meet $npcName:11004619$ in $map:02020051$, figure out $npc:11004618$'s whereabouts, and make contact with $npc:11004618$.
quest.descFameUI: Meet $npcName:11004619$ in $map:02020051$, figure out $npc:11004618$'s whereabouts, and make contact with $npc:11004618$.

quest.name: Tairen's New Weapon
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said Tairen is testing a new mechanical soldier in $map:02020018$. The test subjects are existing mechanical soldiers and the latest machine in blue. $npcName:11004614$ said the scout team discovered a weapon data analyzer set up in $map:02020018$. $npcName:11004614$ thinks a performance test on the new weapon is being conducted with the data analyzer in $map:02020018$. Data analysis on the new weapon is required in order to not lose the war with Tairen. Go to $map:02020018$ and obtained the test data of the data analyzer.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020018$ and obtain the test data of the data analyzer
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020018$ and obtain the test data of the data analyzer.

quest.name: Science Is Not Everything
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the research team is researching the dark power which is the source of contamination by the Daemon Army. She said they are taking a scientific approach to analyze the dark power. You said the dark power is not a scientific phenomenon, but $npcName:11004614$ said there is nothing that can't be revealed with science. It will be faster for her to realize after experiencing it herself. Go to $map:02020036$ and collect the dark power.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020036$ and collect the dark power.

quest.name: Mysterious Ancient Ruins
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said $map:02020017$ is an ancient ruin of Kritias. Since they secured the northwestern part of Kidel, they plan to explore $map:02020017$. $npcName:11004614$ said the first journey of the exploration is securing the ancient ruin of the state building. Investigating the ruin might reveal the origin of the state building. Go to $map:02020017$ and secure the ancient ruin of the state building.
quest.manual: Go to $map:02020017$ and secure the ancient ruin of the state building
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020017$ and secure the ancient ruin of the state building.

quest.name: Tamed Beast
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said they found $map:52100114$, but are having trouble entering because of $npcName:25022901$ guarding Tekin. $npcName:11004614$ said the soldiers received great damage due to their sharp tusks. It's not easy to suppress them since they are covered in armor and very fast. Go to $map:52100114$ and suppress $npcName:25022901$ before more soldiers get hurt.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:52100114$ and suppress $npcName:25022901$.

quest.name: Terror of Pitch Darkness
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the special forces attacking $map:02020070$ suffered greatly from $npcName:25022607$ and $npcName:25022608$. The Daemon Master has tremendous attack power compared to the normal group. $npcName:11004614$ said the soldiers just freeze when seeing their black cape. If the Daemon Master isn't suppressed, the attack on $map:02020070$ will not succeed. Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022607$ and $npcName:25022608$.
quest.descFameUI: Go to $map:02020070$ and suppress $npcName:25022607$ and $npcName:25022608$.

quest.name: Lethal Savage
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the allied soldiers attacking $map:02020070$ and $map:02020071$ suffered greatly due to the Daemon Army's beasts. They claw with their sharp toes and ram with the huge horns on their back. Even the heavily armed special forces are knocked out with a single blow. If these beasts are not suppressed, the attack on $map:02020070$ and $map:02020071$ will not succeed. Suppress $npcName:25022606$ and $npcName:25022609$ in $map:02020070$ and $npcName:25022703$ and $npcName:25022709$ in $map:02020071$.
quest.descFameUI: Suppress $npcName:25022606$ and $npcName:25022609$ in $map:02020070$ and $npcName:25022703$ and $npcName:25022709$ in $map:02020071$.

quest.name: Distant Victory
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said they were able to take over the northern part of Kidel due to the joint operation with the Maple Alliance, but they suffered greatly from attacks by Tairen's mechanical soldiers. $npcName:25023003$, $npcName:25023004$, and $npcName:25023303$ especially dealt great damage with their powerful combat power to the soldiers. $npcName:11004614$ said they might seize the chance of victory in this war with Tairen if they are suppressed. Defeat $npcName:25023003$ and $npcName:25023004$ in $map:52100115$ which is connected to $map:02020013$ and $npcName:25023303$ in $map:52100118$ which is connected to $map:02020051$.
quest.descFameUI: Defeat $npcName:25023003$ and $npcName:25023004$ in $map:52100115$ and $npcName:25023303$ in $map:52100118$.

quest.name: Pessimistic Simulation
quest.desc: $npcName:11004614$ said the special forces will soon ambush Kharon's base, $map:52100114$ and $map:52100116$. If they go through with this raid operation, they will suffer greatly from $npcName:25022902$, $npcName:25022903$, and $npcName:25023102$. It's because the result of the combat simulation was the soldiers are weak to these Kharon forces. Factors that will make this raid operation fail need to be removed. Suppress $npcName:25022902$ and $npcName:25022903$ in $map:52100114$ which is connected to $map:02020067$ and $npcName:25023102$ in $map:52100116$ which is connected to $map:02020003$.
quest.descFameUI: Suppress $npcName:25022902$ and $npcName:25022903$ in $map:52100114$ and $npcName:25023102$ in $map:52100116$.
